title: Judging R.L. Stine’s Books By Their Covers: The Coolest And Creepiest From The Master of Chills
text:
Judging R.L. Stine’s Books By Their Covers: The Coolest And Creepiest From The Master of Chills 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
Today we celebrate the birth of R.L. Stine and begin counting down to the premiere of the Goosebumps movie. The premise is awesome: B...
